hamapay.text: Fight Hamamatsu! Campaign to get up to 30% back at participating stores.

life.text: Powered by Loco Guide Crowd Ramp ●●●

title: What is にゃーにゃー(Near-Near)
Please use this site to help you live a better Near-Near life!

content.title: Stay NEAR, Enjoy NEAR
content.text_1: Try to stay as close to home as possible and have fun without moving around.
content.text_2: Take advantage of the shops near you and help revitalize the local economy.
content.text_3: Keep the social distance, but keep micro-tourism in mind ♪

menu.title: Hamamatsu PayPay
menu.text_2: Let's shop 'a lot' and 'save' in Hamamatsu City!

menu.title: Food
menu.text_1: Let's eat at near store. Let's take it back.

menu.title: Drink/Dessert
menu.text_2: We always have room for dessert...

menu.title: Supermarket・Drugstore
menu.text_2: However, try to avoid the crowds.

menu.title: Mask
menu.text_2: Leave behind with a stylish mask!

menu.title: Firework
menu.text_1: Fireworks are a part of Japanese culture.
menu.text_2: A project to set off fireworks all over the country at once, It was a lot of fun!
menu.text_3: Also crowdfunding. Search on 「日本の花火エールプロジェクト」!

menu.title: Outdoor
menu.text_2: Avoid the denseness and go into the nearby nature.

menu.title: Hot Spring
menu.text_1: ake a relaxing dip in the bathtub.

menu.title: Plant
menu.text_1: 花を愛でよう。植物を育てよう。
menu.text_2: 自然を感じられる空間ってステキじゃないですか。
